body_html:
I also fail to build ios, facebook/rocksdb#4064 seems to be related.
I am still figuring out how to resolve it.
#######################################################
I searched keyword 'aligned new' and found commit checked out to #92f67d .
Now it builds.
I will use this version temporarily until this issue resolves.
#######################################################
build works temporarily by removing '-faligned_new ' flag in CmakeList.txt file located at a root.
This is the workaround, not a solution.

body:
I also fail to build ios, facebook/rocksdb#4064 seems to be related. 
I am still figuring out how to resolve it.
#######################################################
I searched keyword 'aligned new' and found commit checked out to #92f67d .
Now it builds.
I will use this version temporarily until this issue resolves.
#######################################################
build works temporarily by removing '-faligned_new '  flag in CmakeList.txt file located at a root.
This is the workaround, not a solution.
